column4: seriously any friggin  broadcom 43xx wireless users out there....i seriously need help...i've been reading the forums all friggin day tryin this and that..and nuttin seems to be working...and all the websites say it does...so wtf
i have it working currently
did ou install the new firmware in the /lib/firmware folder?

use that url i just posted to get the wl_psta.o file and then move it to /lib/firmware and then use bcm43xx-fwcutter to extract and then run ifconfig eth1 up and then set your parameters via iwconfig eth1
that webiste is for gfx issue
ok access point:  Invalid
is the essid and channel set properly?
channel?  somethin like  iwconfig eth1 channel 11
this what u wanted?   http://paste.ubuntu-nl.org/13540
is that the right channel/freq?
i did  sudo iwconfig eth1 channel 11
do you have mac filtering on or anything?
i was talking to garageman on the google thing
did you install the new firmware to /lib/firmware?
did you copy it to the /lib/firmware folder?
try rebooting
